name: Stop it - Driving Simulation
detailed_description:
Every year thousands of people are taking risks driving tired, under the influence of alcohol or simply watching their smartphone.
Stop it - Driving Simulation shows you how these behaviours are dangerous. It can teach you what kind of consequences you might encounter.

3 modes :

• Alcohol: See how dangerous it is to drive under the effects of alcohol...
• Smartphone: Did you ever watched a text while driving ? A few seconds can lead to unexpected consequences.
• Driving fatigue: Driving while you are tired is a bad option, try and see what kind of things may happens!

You may use VR controllers, Xbox Controller and coming soon your Steering Wheel to control the car.
This software is for educational purpose only.
